DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study investigate effect dietary ingredient ( polyphenols carotenoid ) vascular function acute glucose load . Each subject receive 4 week intervention test product placebo product dietary restriction run-in period 14 day . Subjects challenge oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) immediately run-in phase end intervention phase . During OGTT , blood sample take regular interval . The study conduct subject impair glucose tolerance .
DOC.criteria: Males female confirm IGT ; Age ≥ 35 ≤ 65 year screening ; Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 25 < 40 kg/m2 ; Reported intense sporting activity ≤ 10h/w ; Reported alcohol consumption ≤ 14 units/week ( female volunteer ) ≤ 21 units/week ( male volunteer ) Currently smoke nonsmoker least six month Any medical condition use overthecounter prescribe medication might affect study measurement ( judge study physician ) ; No report participation another nutritional biomedical trial 3 month screen ; Reported weight loss gain 10 % period 6 month prior screen ; Antihyperglycemic drug medication interfere study measurement ; No blood donation 1 month prior screening ; Reported allergy intolerance test product food product provide study ;
